casebody.data:
Patrick JEFFERS
v.
Donald F. D'ALESSANDRO, M.D., the Miller Orthopaedic Clinic, Inc., Richardson Sports Limited Partnership, d/b/a Carolina Panthers, and PFF, Inc. No. 252P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. Lewis A. Cheek, Durham, John C. Rogers, III, Martha E. Soule, for Jeffers. Harvey L. Cosper, Jr., Chip Holmes, Raymond E. Owens, Jr., Christopher C. Lam, Charlotte, for D'Allessandro and Miller Ortho. Samuel H. Poole, Jr., Mark W. Merritt, Angelique Vincent, Charlotte, Jaye E. Bingham, Raleigh, for Richardson Sports Ltd., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 10th day of May 2005 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th day of June 2005."
